lead_paragraph: Liverpool climbed out of the relegation zone when Maxi Rodriguez poked in a goal in the 86th minute of a 1-0 victory against Bolton for its second successive Premier League win.
snippet: Liverpool climbed out of the relegation zone when Maxi Rodriguez poked in a goal in the 86th minute of a 1-0 victory against Bolton for its second successive Premier League win.

headline.main: Liverpool Tops Bolton To Win Second Straight
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Tops Bolton To Win Second Straight
